attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try to see what my conservative family sees in this chode man. Upon even just DOWNLOADING the app i instantly projectile vomited and had to get a whole new phone. This man is so disgusting i can hear him raping people from here.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: My name is James page and I am very disappointed in this app. I really had hope in my racist, homophobic, transphobic, woman hating Cheeto puff president but this is a horrible app! It took one month to download. The app itself was terrible not worth the wait. 🧚🏽🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏽💕🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏽

attributes.title: 1 star
attributes.review: it doesn’t give me enough information and doesn’t let me see a lot of things and I don’t think this is supposed to be happening so this is why I am rating it 1 star

attributes.title: What is this?
attributes.review: The app was overall confusing but the thing that bothered me the most is how disturbing the app is in general . Trump having a app to what watch us? Control us? Update us on his daily presidential life that’s coming to a end. This app STANK!

attributes.title: disappointing
attributes.review: i’m very upset that bunker boy didn’t use any orange in the app to match his cheeto complexion. and what’s up with the age restrictions? you have to be over 17 to download the app? i thought trump REALLY liked the children under 17, or should i say 13.

attributes.title: Just all around awful
attributes.review: I don’t even know how anyone could use this app. Super glitchy and full of rude people. It’s almost like everyone on this app doesn’t know how to do research or even have common sense.

attributes.title: 1 Star 🙄🙄🙄
attributes.review: This app made my dog glitch so much! She didn’t have enough storage to fit all the terrible information. This app is a waste of pets. I also downloaded it another time and it killed my two birds.

attributes.title: I hat this app🤢
attributes.review: Trump has not been doing a good job as our president therefore I don’t think we should vote for him again as our president. He hasn’t done anything about the riots and hasn’t done anything to help keep the riots peaceful.

attributes.title: Worst president
attributes.review: This app is glitchy as hell but it also supports a facist dictator who would rather oppress the people of this nation and divide them than bring them together. Trump is attacking minorities who rights have been stolen. Please don’t vote for him in 2020. Be the change! 👊🏼👊🏽👊🏾👊🏿

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so much and it took so long to downlode! I would never recommend to anyone! People should not be supporting someone who doesnt want to support blm! This app needs to get taken out of the app store.
